title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; runs in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (formerly Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with file upload, RAG, multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, model management, embeddings.

title: OllamaSharp
summary: .NET/C# client for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface for chat, generate, embed.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot frontend that proxies to Ollama; Dockerized for quick demos.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop GUI for Ollama (Windows/Linux/macOS) with model manager.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: Collection of GitHub Actions to download, cache, and spin up Ollama for CI testing.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB with FastAPI backend.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Unofficial Nim language client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; small surface, idiomatic error handling, streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community repo of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Chroma, qDrant, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI copilot sidebar powered by Ollama.
